mapper.select:
/* 다운로드 이력 count selectCount */ select count(*) as tot_cnt ,ceil(count(*) / ${top_cnt}) as page_cnt from tbl_down_hist where 1=1 and down_datm between to_date(#{down_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{down_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and down_id like #{down_id} || '%'
and down_name like #{down_name} || '%'
and rec_datm between to_date(#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
and down_src != 'AP'

/* 다운로드 이력 전체 조회 (엑셀다운로드) selectListAll */ select to_char(tdh.down_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as down_datm ,tdh.down_id ,tdh.down_name ,tdh.down_ip ,to_char(tdh.rec_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rec_datm ,tdh.rec_keycode ,tdh.rec_filename ,tdh.user_id ,tdh.user_name ,tdh.local_no ,nvl(tdh.reason_code, '') as reason_code ,nvl(tdh.reason_text, '') as reason_text ,(case tdh.down_src when 'AP' then 'TA' else '' end) as down_src ,(case when nvl(tdh.reason_code, '') != '' then fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON', tdh.reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code and mpart_code = tu.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code and mpart_code = tu.mpart_code and spart_code = tu.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_down_hist tdh left join tbl_user tu on tdh.down_id = tu.user_id where 1=1 and tdh.down_datm between to_date(#{down_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{down_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and tdh.down_id like #{down_id} || '%'
and tdh.down_name like #{down_name} || '%'
and tdh.rec_datm between to_date(#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and tdh.user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and tdh.user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and tdh.reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
and tdh.down_src != 'AP'
order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}
